backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing product management, user profiles, purchases, admin-restricted actions, and blob uploads with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI/authorization behaviors and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file providing the root element and loading the Vite main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global theme provider and TanStack Router routes for storefront, products, admin, and library views.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable access denied screen with optional message and button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFil: Button for uploading PDF files, supporting loading state and repeated selections.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with authenticated navigation, including dynamic admin button states driven by admin checks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, link to developer tools modal, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing consistent header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product details including type, title, author, price, and links to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Developer tools modal for sending update instructions, retrying deployments, and generating failure reports.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search input component for filtering products by title or author.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section with marketing text and a banner image for the storefront.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and admin data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light and dark modes, and common layout and typography utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing products, including creation, editing, publishing, deleting, and file uploads with permission and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays purchased products and handles authenticated file downloads with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information, handles purchase actions, and manages loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Renders product listings with search filtering, user profile setup prompts, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides helper functions returning recommended deployment retry and diagnostic commands.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Analyzes parsed deployment logs and returns suggested fixes based on common build, bundle, and install error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses raw deployment logs to detect failing steps and extract relevant error blocks. Includes logic for build, bundle, install, and generic error detection.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Builds a formatted multi-section deployment failure report using parsed log details and fix suggestions. Outputs a structured, readable text report for developers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving persisted values. Includes utilities for managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries. Extends theme settings used throughout the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature definitions for the app. Indicates deployment problems and missing admin upload functionality.
